ripe.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: ripe fruit or crops are fully grown and ready to eat
ripe.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: ripe cheese has developed a strong taste and is ready to eat
ripe.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a ripe smell is strong and unpleasant – used humorously
ripe.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: We were pretty ripe after a week of walking.
